hi and welcome you listening to the x-22

1622 a.n today's date is July 24th 2018
and the start of the episode is the

they've seen inflation and now Venezuela
the IMF is reporting that they're going

which real and it's by the year-end
which really means they won't be able to
use the currency it all will be

because the debt level the amount of
currency that was created over this

everything before that what we're going

going to come home because we see things
breaking down in the Middle East we see
things completely breaking down in each
and every country where the economy is
not doing well now to put this into
perspective on how bad things are
according to financial writer Simon
Black the federal government is spending
approximately fifty two thousand dollars
per second now this not last year's tax
cuts is the reason why the national debt
has reached a record 21 trillion dollars
which is more than America's gross
domestic product which is the GDP
another anima sign is that this year
both Social Security and Medicare will
have to draw down on their reserve funds
to be able to pay benefits the Social
Security Medicare trust funds will both
soon be bankrupt putting additional
strains on the federal budget and the
American taxpayers examples of fiscal
irresponsibility
ability on Capitol Hill is all over the
place I mean it's really not that hard
to find when the economic crisis hits
there will be no choice but to cut
spending and raise taxes of course
Congress is unlikely to raise taxes or
cut benefits instead it will rely on the

the inflation tax the inflation tax is
the worst type of tax because it is both
hidden and regressive increasing federal
debt will also put pressure on the

low and they're already talking about
keeping the rates low around 2020 and
they'll keep them low to prevent federal

skyrocketing eventually the feds
monetization of the debt will lead to

dollars world reserve currency status I
mean when we start to really understand
and start to look at what is going on
here we realize why countries are
dumping Treasuries why they're buying
gold I mean Russia is the perfect
example Russia has been liquidating the
US Treasury holdings they've been buying
gold and they haven't stopped China has
been purchasing gold India has been
purchasing gold there's a lot of

their gold and they're doing this
because they understand what is
happening there remember the central
bankers they had a plan they wanted
globalization they wanted a one-world
government they wanted complete control
they wanted an even playing field with
all the countries this is why they
having the refugees come up to blend
everyone together to say hey every
single place is exactly the same there's
no difference whatsoever and we can't
have one country getting pay that's
higher than another country country we
have to bring them all to a level
playing field that was their goal and
they were going to have an event to do

going to move the system to another area
and this area was China they've been
preparing for this they've been creating
the correct atmosphere
to have manufacturing to have a trade
system to have the exchanges it was all

really look back in time this is what
they've been doing
slowly but surely because this was part

going to benefit the people we're gonna

the Affordable Care Act it's not

what are these countries well the United

it has nothing to do with the tariffs
what this really means is Trump has been
ripping apart their globalization plan
and they don't like this remember
central bank's that's in their titles
central centralization central banks
they want everything centralized they

with the World Trade Organization with
the creation of currency with the

and basically this is what they
shooting for for many many years now
what Trump is doing he is D globalizing

factories were moved to places where two

while cheap petroleum permitted
transportation of finished products to

now think about this everything was

our school systems funded by these taxes
they fell into decay towns fell into

absolutely loved globalization why

he put forth tariffs sanctions

invested in this a lot of time invested

everything
well the easy answer is to bring

they're setting everything up so nobody

well you don't want it to you don't want
